topics.title: AMA Format Changes and Schedule Announcement
topics.summary: Introduction of new monthly AMA format with structured scheduling. First Wednesday/Thursday features guest speakers, third Thursday has community discussions, with flexible programming for other weeks.

topics.title: USE Stablecoin Launch Success and Off-chain Bot Development
topics.summary: USE stablecoin launch achieved 395,000 ERG backing with 129 participants. Off-chain bots going live today with UI expected by weekend. Project aims to activate dormant community liquidity for ecosystem growth.

topics.title: USE Stablecoin Technical Design and Dexy Gold Comparison
topics.summary: kushti explains USE contract development and comparison with Dexy Gold experimental launch. Emphasizes fair launch documentation to avoid future mythology like SigmaUSD experienced.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Cross-chain Expansion Strategy
topics.summary: Discussion of using Rosen Bridge to expand USE to new markets including Binance Smart Chain and Base. Bridge designed for censorship resistance with geographically distributed guards and no central control points.

topics.title: Reserve Assets and Market Volatility Discussion
topics.summary: Analysis of using different reserve assets like precious metals versus USD focus. Discussion of paper markets, rehypothecation issues, and decision to focus on USD first due to market dominance and understanding.

topics.title: Kachina Protocol and Privacy Technologies
topics.summary: Discussion of Kachina protocol from Midnight blockchain for private contracts. Plans to potentially bring USE to Midnight via Rosen Bridge for private stablecoin functionality, with consideration of post-quantum cryptography challenges.

topics.title: Multi-chain USE Deployment and Uniswap V3 Efficiency
topics.summary: Richie explains plans for USE expansion using Uniswap V3 concentrated liquidity for 20x efficiency gains. Focus on Binance Smart Chain first, then other chains, with community-crowdsourced liquidity provision.

topics.title: Off-chain Bot Redundancy and Integration Plans
topics.summary: Discussion of off-chain bot redundancy for USE protocol and potential integration with Machina Finance for enhanced liquidity efficiency. Plans for wallet integration and multiple DEX support.

topics.title: CLB Token Trading and LP Token Mechanics
topics.summary: Explanation of CLB tokens as tradeable liquidity provider tokens with two-year lock period until December 2027. Tokens represent stake in USE liquidity pool and can be traded before redemption period.

topics.title: Rosen Runes Bitcoin Integration and DeFi Development
topics.summary: Rosen Runes launched enabling Bitcoin asset wrapping. Exploration of interactive transaction construction and partially signed transactions for Bitcoin DeFi, plus integration with Ducat protocol stablecoin.

topics.title: Lithos Mining Protocol Testnet Success
topics.summary: Lithos testnet showing strong participation with successful fraud proof implementation. First successful slashing occurred, demonstrating the audit mechanism where miners are incentivized to catch and report fraudulent work submissions.

topics.title: Academic Papers and Research Workshop Participation
topics.summary: Multiple papers accepted for stability workshop in Jaipur, India on December 15th. Chain cache, Dexy, and other research papers to be presented by kushti, Luca, and Bruno.

topics.title: Wallet Updates and Sub-blocks Development
topics.summary: New Minotaur wallet version ready, Ergo Wallet update under testing. Sub-blocks devnet testing completed with mining peers, broader community testing to begin soon with white paper publication planned.

topics.title: Community Hub and Development Tools Updates
topics.summary: Recognition of Bez's work on ergoblockchain.org community hub and marketing materials. Discussion of Digin's World development platform and AI-assisted contract coding experiments.

topics.title: Mexico Conference and Event Planning
topics.summary: Discussion of potential Anarcopulco conference participation in Acapulco, Mexico in late February. Plans to showcase mesh networks and peer-to-peer cash systems for community trading.

topics.title: BRIC Educational Token Economy Expansion
topics.summary: Major BRIC system upgrade moving from Discord Tipperbot to Nautilus integration with automated reward distribution. Students earn BRIC for shop check-ins and can spend it on 3D printing costs, creating circular economy.
